author: hwright
msg: Followup to r38580: Reuse an absolute path in place of fetching it again.
[ This inadvertently fixes a test failure in r38580. ]
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(check_prop_mods): Take a local absolute path, in place of generating it.
(harvest_committables): Reuse a previously-generated local absolute path.

author: stsp
msg: Rip out some adm_access usage, this time in svn_client__do_commit().
Patch by: HuiHuang <yellow.flying@yahoo.com.cn>
* subversion/libsvn_client/client.h
(svn_client__do_commit): Remove adm_access parameter.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c,
subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c
(svn_client_commit4, wc_to_repos_copy): Track above parameter removal.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(do_item_commit): Stop using an adm_access and entries.
Move an already existing local_abspath to function-wide scope,
and use it and the wc context provided in the client context
for various updates from wc-1 APIs to WC-NG APIs.

author: stylesen
msg: Revert r38576.
The comment was correct, I should have given a closer look before
committing this. The sentence sounded as if it was a typo, but after
looking at the surrounding code, it was not.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/mergeinfo.c
(svn_client__get_repos_mergeinfo): Following up on r38577, fix grammar.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/mergeinfo.c
(svn_client__get_repos_mergeinfo): Add note on implications for issue #3242.
